mapper.insert: insert into j_bonus_fxj (id, u_id, u_name, parent_id, parent_money,status, created) values (null, #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, date_sub(now(),interval 12 hour))
mapper.select:
SELECT u_name,parent_money,DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y-%m-%d' ) created FROM j_bonus_fxj
and parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND status = 1 AND YEARWEEK(date_format(created,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())
ORDER BY created DESC
select parent_id,sum(parent_money) as amount from j_bonus_fxj where status = 1 and to_days(now()) - to_days(created) = 1 group by parent_id
